msContents.summary: A Karaim translation of the Torah and the Haftarah

ab.title: Genesis 49
ab.l: And Jacob calledhis sons, and said, ‘Assemble and let me tell youwhat will befall you in the last days.
Assemble and listen, oh sons of Jacob,and listen to the words of Israel, your father.
Reuben, you are my firstborn, my might, and the beginning of my strength,the fame of priesthood and the fame of reign.
Recklessness like the flow of water is to be found in you, you will not be famous,because you went up to your father’s bed, then you defiled,it was cut off |from you|.
Simeon and Leviare brothers: weapons of wickedness are in their habitations.
My soul did not come into their secret, into their assembly,my spirit did not become united. For in their anger they killed a man,and they wilfully ruined a stronghold.
Cursed istheir anger, for it is fierce, and their fury, for it is cruel.I will divide them in Jacob, and scatter them in Israel.
Judah: You, your brothers will praise you. Your hand will beon the neck of your enemies, your father’s children will bow down before you.
Judah is a lion’s cub: from prey, my son,you are gone up. He kneeled down, he lay down as a lion, and as a lioness:who will rouse him?
Reign will not departfrom Judah, or a statute-giver among his families, untilthe Messiah comes, and to him will be the obedience of the peoples.
He will tie his mule to the vine and his donkey’s colt to a thin branch,he will wash his garments in wine and his quilt in the blood of grapes.
The redness of his eyes will be because of the plentyof wine, and the whiteness of his teeth will be because of the plenty of milk.
Zebulun will dwell at the haven of the seas, andhe shall be for a haven for ships, and his border shall be at Sidon.
Issachar is of thick bones, lies downbetween two †cowsheds.
And he saw rest, that it was good,and the land, that it was pleasant, and he bowed his shoulder to bearthe burden of reading the Law, and became a tribute-payer,instead of a servant.
Dan will judge his peopleas one of the tribes of Israel from which Shimshon will come forth,and will be the judge of Israel.
Dan will be like a serpentby the road, like a viper by the path, that bitesthe horse’s heels, and its rider falls backward.
I hope for your salvation, oh Lord.
Gad,a troop gathers over him, but at the last he will gatherand overcome.
About Asher: his food will be fat, and hewill yield a king’s heavenly food.
Naphtaliis like a fawn let loose, who gives pleasant words.
Joseph is like a bough at full strength, a spreading bough by a well, thinbranches that strutted on a stronghold.
Andthe archers teased him, and shot at him, and were hostile to him.
But his bow dwelt in strength, andthe arms of his hands were made strong by the strength of the mighty Godof Jacob, from there is the shepherd, the foundation of Israel,

by the command of God of your father, and he shall help you,and by the mighty God, and he shall bless you with blessings of heavensfrom the heavens above, with blessings of the deep that lies beneath,with blessings of the breasts and of the womb.

The blessingsof your father have prevailed above the blessings of my parentsup to the tokens of the everlasting rocks. They shall be on the head of Joseph,and on the brow of the head of the one separate from his brothers.
Benjamin will tear up like a wolf, in the morning he will devour the cattle, and at nighthe will divide the spoil.’
All these are the twelve tribes of Israel:and this is it what their father spoke to them, and he blessed them.He blessed them each according to his blessing.
Andhe commanded them, and said to them, ‘I will be gatheredto my people. Bury me next to my fathers in the cave that is in the fieldof Ephron, the Hittite.
In the cave thatis in the field of Machpelah, which is before Mamre, in the land of Canaan,where Abraham bought the field from Ephron, the Hittite,for a possession as a sepulchre.
There they buriedAbraham and Sarah, his wife, there they buriedIsaac and Rebekah, his wife, and there I buriedLeah.
The purchase of the field and of the cavethat is in it was from the children of Heth.’
AndJacob finished commanding his sons, and he gatheredhis feet into the bed, and rested, and was gatheredto his people.
